page.title: 11PORTHMADOG POLICE
page.content: In Porthmadog there is a police station with twelve police officers based there.Itis not manned continuously,but there is cover over the full 24 hours.If it is closed,the public have to contact Pwllheli,14 miles away,through the usual 999 call. The town is policed by patrol on foot but the out-lying areas are covered by police cars.Borth-y-Gest is covered by patrol car from Porthmadog,but Minffordd is in the charge of the police at Penrhyndeudraeth.The area is generally law-abiding with little or no major crime.House-burglaries and thefts from unattended cars are the most common crimes.There is a marked increase in petty crime during the summer months when there is an influx of visitors to the area.
